oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Differential Diagnosis of Colic in Calves
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wendel, H.
Rademacher, G.
Klee, W.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: diagnostic validity
age
gender
clinical signs
intensity of colic
laboratory parameters
diagnostic work-up
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this prospective study was a quantification of the diagnostic validity of age, gender, selected clinical signs, intensity of colic, selected laboratory parameters, and duration of illness, with respect to different disease categories. The ultimate aim was to produce information that can help in the diagnostic work-up of colic in calves.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2001; 209-210
